data.text:
@MoreThomas976 @1398cutty @momof331 Everything goes full stop.
But no mean tweets!
@MoreThomas976 Whatever one think about Trump, he did made us look. Now we're looking and seeing and it's not pretty 🤬
@momof331 Little of both. The USA went from not existing to leading the world in propaganda, war, and spraying the world sick in under 300 years. That takes some doing.

@MoreThomas976 Right, but it was a drip drip kind of thing before
 So either we were blind or we looked the other way🤷‍♀️
@momof331 Control and power. How many times has it been done before both here and around the globe?

@MoreThomas976 That's what they're planing for us.
I'm wondering why the rush to destroy the country? They're moving pretty fast.

@momof331 The gas prices will affect everyone. It is March. So they will price middle America out of travelling, truckers will strike, groceries will skyrocket, airlines will get hammered with cancelled lights as no one will be able to afford the jacked up flight rates. Economy crushed
